Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display a date in dd - MM - yyyy format using the <font face="courier new">DateTimePicker</font> control. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
DateTimePicker dtpBirthDate = new DateTimePicker;
dtpBirthDate.Format = DateTimePickerFormat.Custom;
dtpBirthDate.CustomFormat = "dd - MM - yyyy";

DateTimePicker dtpBirthDate = new DateTimePicker();
dtpBirthDate.Format = DateTimePickerFormat.Short;
dtpBirthDate.CustomFormat = "dd - MM - yyyy";

DateTimePicker dtpBirthDate = new DateTimePicker();
dtpBirthDate.Format = DateTimePickerFormat.Custom;
dtpBirthDate.CustomFormat = "dd - MM - yyyy";

DateTimePicker dtpBirthDate = new DateTimePicker();
dtpBirthDate.Format = DateTimePickerFormat.Custom();
dtpBirthDate.CustomFormat = "dd - MM - yyyy";

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (C).
